rules_text:
Haste
[i]Calm[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if Hisame, Pickle Pro did not attack this turn, put a shield counter on him. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
[i]Great Teacher[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, for each kind of counter of counter on Hisame, put that kind of counter onto another target creature you control.
